actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Recognizing the 60th anniversary of the first official meeting between soldiers of the United States Army and soldiers of the Soviet Army at Torgau, Germany, and commending the excellent service of the 69th Infantry Division of the United States Army during World War II.

summary.text: Recognizes the 60th anniversary of the first official meeting between soldiers of the U.S. Army and soldiers of the Soviet Army at Torgau, Germany, on April 25, 1945.

titles.title: Recognizing the 60th anniversary of the first official meeting between soldiers of the United States Army and soldiers of the Soviet Army at Torgau, Germany, and commending the excellent service of the 69th Infantry Division of the United States Army during World War II.
